Generally, this guidance should be followed and exceptions should be clearly demarcated / discussed. Mitigating data loss risk via deletion_protection # Some resources, such as databases, have a significant risk of unrecoverable data loss if the resource is accidentally deleted due to a change to a ForceNew field.
